ModMetaData.description: Ever wanted to be able to craft your own coins? Say no more! Adds the ability to make coins to the game which act as functional props of sorts, now with styles! Does not replace Silver as primary Currency.(yet) [Lite] version of Medieval Coins by Saiphe. --- Changelog: 12.01.23v1.2.3 -Morbid Hotfix -Optional Patches 12.01.23v1.2.2 -Recipe Hotfix --- Contains: Changes: • Changes Gold and Silver textures to resemble Iron New Item: • Coin - Made from various materials and is used soley as a currency. - Can be used for Royal Favor •Ideology Style -Buddhist -Christian -Islamic -Morbid -Techist New Building: • Coining Mill - Textures from Medieval Overhaul New Research: • Coinage Mod Support: • Medieval Overhaul -Research and Building Cost • Simple FX: Shinies Version 1.2.3
